chapters.title: Chapter 8: A Simple Country Woman
chapters.info: Lady Deira ni Ghaline t'Bashere, p. 191 (207)—Faile's mother. She has black hair, and is about a head taller than her husband Davram, the Marshal-General of Saldaea. She did not approve of her daughter's marriage at first, but was eventually convinced to accept it. See also t'Aybara, Faile ni Bashere.
